CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y stress moreutils iperf
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine:
echo '#!/bin/sh
cpustressmax=${BUBLA_MAXCPU:-3}
iostressmax=${BUBLA_MAXIO:-128}
vmstressmax=${BUBLA_MAXMEM:-128}
stresstimemax=${BUBLA_MAXSTRESSTIME:-5}
sleeptimemax=${BUBLA_MAXSLEEPTIME:-1200}
iperfserverhost=${BUBLA_IPERFSERVERHOST:-speedtest.wtnet.de}
iperfserverport=${BUBLA_IPERFSERVERPORT:-5207}
while getopts 'c:i:h:m:l:p:s:' opt; do
  case "$opt" in
    c)
      cpustressmax=$OPTARG
      ;;
    i)
      iostressmax=$OPTARG
      ;;
    h)
      iperfserverhost=$OPTARG
      ;;
    m)
      vmstressmax=$OPTARG
      ;;
    l)
      stresstimemax=$OPTARG
      ;;
    p)
      iperfserverport=$OPTARG
      ;;
    s)
      sleeptimemax=$OPTARG
      ;;
  esac
done
echo "INIT PARAM: max CPU stress	 $cpustressmax "
echo "INIT PARAM: max IO stress	 $iostressmax "
echo "INIT PARAM: max MEM stress	 $vmstressmax "
echo "INIT PARAM: stress TIME max	 $stresstimemax "
echo "INIT PARAM: sleep TIME max	 $sleeptimemax "
echo "INIT PARAM: iperf server 	 $iperfserverhost:$iperfserverport "
while :
do
  echo "infinite loops stress and release [ hit CTRL+C to stop]"
  stresstime=$(shuf -i 1-$stresstimemax -n 1)
  cpustress=$(shuf -i 1-$cpustressmax -n 1)
  iostress=$(shuf -i 1-$iostressmax -n 1)
  vmstress=$(shuf -i 1-$vmstressmax -n 1)
  echo stress $cpustress cpu, $iostress io, $vmstress mem, for $stresstime sec | ts
  stress -c $cpustress -i $iostress -m $vmstress -t $stresstime
  echo iperf -c $iperfserverhost -p $iperfserverport -t $stresstime -b 10M -u | ts
  iperf -c $iperfserverhost -p $iperfserverport -t $stresstime -b 10M -u
  sleeptime=$(shuf -i 1-$sleeptimemax -n 1)
  echo sleep for $sleeptime sec | ts
  sleep $sleeptime
done' >> /bin/bubla.sh
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: useradd -u 501 -m -g root bubla && chown -R bubla:root /home/bubla && chmod 744 /home/bubla
Commands.Name: run
